definition: arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)
thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash
(of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with

sentences.english: The pulse discharge phenomena of gas-liquid mixture in wire-wire gap are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了气液混合两相体中线线电极脉冲放电现象。

sentences.english: This study is significant for generation of ultra-short optical pulse chain at high repetition rate.
sentences.chinese: 该研究对高重复率脉冲串产生具有一定意义。

sentences.english: The enhancements allow for sending and receiving short C2CK pulses.
sentences.chinese: 这些改进允许发送和接收短的C2CK脉冲。

sentences.english: A spark gap is one of key devices of pulsed power technology.
sentences.chinese: 气体开关是高重复频率脉冲功率技术的关键技术。

sentences.english: Applying needles at pressure points is thought to trigger electrical pulses that suppress appetite.
sentences.chinese: 将细针扎在压力穴可以诱发抑制食欲的神经电脉冲。

sentences.english: The pulse-jet cleaning technologies have been widely used in filtration and dust cleaning.
sentences.chinese: 指出脉冲反吹技术在过滤除尘工艺中得到了普遍应用。

sentences.english: Calorimeter can only measure optical pulse energy of nanoJoules.
sentences.chinese: 研制了用于测量皮焦尔量级光脉冲的微能量计。

sentences.english: In my dissertation, I had successfully programmed the designed pulse sequence.
sentences.chinese: 本文成功地在编程平台上实现了设计的脉冲序列。

sentences.english: Adopt 555 in fixed time the machine is second pulser of main parts.
sentences.chinese: 采用555定时器为主要部件的秒脉冲发生器。

sentences.english: The experimental results and photos of the pulse current wave are also presented.
sentences.chinese: 文章给出了实验结果和典型频率下脉冲电流的示波图。

sentences.english: GPR uses microwave radar pulses to create detailed images of subsurface objects.
sentences.chinese: 探地雷达使用微波雷达脉冲创建详细的地下物体图像。

sentences.english: The effect of high-voltage pulse current on the vitality and reproduction of pine wood nematode was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究高压脉冲电流对松材线虫活力和繁殖的影响。

sentences.english: C-band pulse Doppler weather radar receiver is described in detail in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种C波段脉冲多普勒天气雷达接收机。

sentences.english: Conclusion Pulse-microwave physical therapy produced apparent effects on the treatment of pericoronal infection.
sentences.chinese: 结论脉冲微波理疗对冠周炎有明显的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss application of pulse type tube in vein infusion.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨脉冲式封管在静脉留置针输液中的应用。

sentences.english: The new technique of electromagnetic pulse vibration excitation is a kind of non-contact transient vibration excitation.
sentences.chinese: 新型电磁脉冲激振技术是一种非接触的瞬态激振。
